item.title: Using git, GitHub, and R Studio
item.description: Workshop Slides are Here Additional slides about collaborative git workflows (Courtesy of Molly Caldwell!) Pre-Workshop To-Do We’re so excited to talk and learn about git, GitHub and R Studio with you on April 14th! In order to streamline the interactive part of the workshop, here are a few tasks you should complete before our meeting. I bet many of you have already completed at least a few of them, so it shouldn’t take long to finish the list!
